name: RealRef
tag_list: placement, work, employer, rate, opinion, opinions, employee, apply, cv, entrepreuneur, companies, entreprise
overview: RealRef is a free career community where anyone can find and anonymously share an inside look at companies. What sets us apart is that all our information comes from current and former employees. The community is the first of its kind in the region. Users rate companies based on several variables, allowing others and themselves to identify the best places to work, regardless the size or industry of the enterprise, and offer companies a real-time information in order to help them get better.
